parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description: The name of the database account.

parameters.name: AccountPassword
parameters.description: The password of the database account.

parameters.name: DatabaseAddByUser
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the database is manually added. Valid values:

*   **true**: yes
*   **false**: no

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The type of the database. Valid values:

*   **MYSQL**
*   **ORACLE**
*   **MSSQL**

parameters.name: FullPlan
parameters.description:
The policy for full data backup. The value of this parameter is a JSON string. The JSON string contains the following fields:

*   **start**: the start time of a backup task.
*   **interval**: the interval of backup tasks.
*   **type**: the unit of the interval.
*   **days**: the days of a week on which a backup task is performed.

parameters.name: IncPlan
parameters.description:
The policy for incremental data backup. The value of this parameter is a JSON string. The JSON string contains the following fields:

*   **start**: the start time of a backup task.
*   **interval**: the interval of backup tasks.
*   **type**: the unit of the interval.
*   **days**: the days of a week on which a backup task is performed.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeUniBackupDatabase](~~DescribeUniBackupDatabase~~) operation to query the IDs of ECS instances.

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the anti-ransomware policy.

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: The retention period of backup data.

parameters.name: SpeedLimiter
parameters.description: The maximum network bandwidth that is allowed during data backup. Unit: bytes.

parameters.name: UniRegionId
parameters.description: The region in which the server resides.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the server whose data is backed up based on the anti-ransomware policy.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~141932~~) operation to query the UUIDs of servers.
